item.title: IPv6
item.description: Disable ipv6 on Gentoo Filename: /etc/sysctl.conf net.ipv6.conf.eth0.disable_ipv6=1

item.title: Openwrt
item.description: Gentoo Enviroment prepare. Official gentoo package required Gentoo official script Compile openwrt Official compile wiki 编译结果在 bin 的 target 目录中 Install openwrt to TP-Link TL-WR720N TL-WR720N Bin file on openwrt.org 第一次刷机： Reset TL-WR720N，然后在”系统工具&rd

item.title: Ethereum
item.description: Install Gentoo $ sudo layman -a foxiverlay $ sudo eix-update $ emerge -avq net-p2p/go-ethereum $ emerge -avq net-p2p/ethminer Create get account $ geth account new Create ethereum wallet Go to https://github.com/ethereum/mist/releases Download windows version, tutotialhttps://medium.com/@attores/step-by-step-guide-getting-started-with-ethereum etherminerhttps://github.com/ethereum-mining/ethminer/releases Mining Use Internet Server ethermine.org server list Command line ethminer.exe -G -P stratum+ssl://0x3DC7F73Ad59e55f41fc8a40F0304F9e243358f9a.miner1@asia1.ethermine.org:5555 With geth CPU Mining linux geth --mine --minerthreads=4 --cache 4096 GPU Mining With ethermine https://github.com/ethereum-mining/ethminer/releases windows Note: 0.14

item.title: TCP/IP
item.description: Learn Detail Explaination of TCP handshake and Data Transfer

item.title: IPTABLES (Mini Server)
item.description: 参考资料 iptables常用规则：屏蔽IP地址、禁用ping、协议设置、NAT与转发、负载平衡、自定义链 各种iptables中文资料 Most Frequently Used Linux
